name: Free Online CSV Visualizer - ATools
description: Free online CSV data visualization tool with table preview, statistics, and simple charts.
seoDescription: Professional free CSV data visualization tool - ATools - Paste or upload CSV files for table preview, automatic delimiter detection, data statistics analysis, simple chart visualization. Support various delimiters (comma, semicolon, tab), header row detection, large file processing (first 500 rows preview). Completely browser-based processing, no server upload required, 100% protects data privacy. Clean and intuitive interface, simple and efficient operation, is a professional tool for data analysis and visualization. Completely free and open source, supports multiple CSV formats, is the trusted data processing tool for global analysts.

ui.maxRowsHint: Preview shows maximum first 500 rows (to avoid browser lag).
ui.parseError: Parse failed: Please check delimiter/quotes/line breaks.
